item.description:
Because of the bad weather today and the fact that it's SNOWING at Monadnock, tomorrow's hike is changed to Breakhart. This is a much easier hike, so if you were looking for something ultra challenging, this is not your spot! However, for those who still wanted to get out and get some fresh air, meet new people and have fun, please join me!

Breakhart is just 30 minutes north of Boston, and is a really fun place to go for an easy hike. Let's get out and enjoy Spring!!

Details:

http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/breakhrt.htm

Fat Cactus:

http://www.thefatcactus.com/


What to bring: (this is all optional of course, since we aren't doing a strenuous hike)

Hiking boots

Poles (optional)

Windbreaker, rain gear

Change of socks / change of clothes


Water, gatorade, snacks (The best snacks for the trail are ones that will provide you with high energy, such as fruit, granola, peanut butter, bagels, power bars, fruit bars, G.O.R.P. (trail mix), beef jerky, or even candy)

Camera

Hat

Gloves/Mittens

Small first aid kit (bandaids, ointment, etc)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance to the park near the parking lot
item.name: Hike in Breakhart and (after party at Fat Cactus Mexicali Cantina)
